description: a(n) = smallest prime such that a(1), ..., a(n-1) are squares mod a(n).
prog: (Haskell)a034698 n = a034698_list !! (n-1)a034698_list = f [2..] [1] where   f (x:xs) ys | a010051' x == 1 &&                 (and $ map (isSquMod x) ys) = x : f xs (x:ys)               | otherwise                   = f xs ys   isSquMod u v = v `mod` u `elem` (map ((`mod` u) . (^ 2)) [0..u-1])-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 28 2012
author: E. M. Rains (rains(AT)caltech.edu)
